modName: White Demon Hunter Armor UNP RETEXTURE
descriptionHtml:
This is my re-texture for Demon Hunter Armor by jmenaru
Many people requested me to upload this retex! So I asked jmenaru the great modder for permission, and he gave me permission xD! Thank You!

I\'m not good at English, but I\'ll try!
===================
*Belts are not included\"
===================

=============================================================
ORIGINAL MOD (MUST DOWNLOAD THIS BEFORE INSTALLING MY RETEX.)
=============================================================

===========
DESCRIPTION
===========
White version of Demon Hunter Armor I made

 [youtube]JTtqxtc9-Eo[/youtube]


=======

=======
With Mod Manager

======
Credits
======
ALL CREDIT GOES TO jmenaru


============================

============================

RACEMENU


====================================================================
I heard that hellosanta will release new race!
It will be based on SG texture.
And when it release......

I WILL UPLOAD MY CHARACTER AS COMPANION. SO PLZ NO MORE ASKING
author: HanDdukBaegi
